issue.title: [Rust] DoubleEndedIterator for BitChunks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11471](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11471). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The usecase is to efficiently find the last non-null value in an array slice by iterating over the bits in chunks and using u64::leading_zeroes

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11471?focusedCommentId=17332204) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/173
